original_text:
The pangs of childbirth come for him,
    but he is an unwise son,
for at the right time he does not present himself
    at the opening of the womb.
korean_text: 해산하는 여인의 어려움이 그에게 임하리라 그는 지혜 없는 자식이로다 해산할 때가 되어도 그가 나오지 못하느니라

sentences.original_text: The pangs of childbirth come for him,
but he is an unwise son,
for at the right time he does not present himself
sentences.korean_translation: 때가 되어도 그는 나타나지 않기 때문입니다.

sentences.original_text: at the opening of the womb.
